messages.subject: Sandra's foot
messages.msgSnippet: ... too much ... it goes! Sandra.. I hope your foot heals soon. It s a good excuse to sit and read, but I know it s a pain (no pun) when you want to get up and
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., SandraDodd@a... wrote:
> http://www.terc.edu/handson/s96/zoom.html
>
> There, and illustrations too!
>
> I had thought I could get through the e-mail but my foot is hurting
too much
> and so I have to go back to the couch with 300 unread messages. So
it goes!

Sandra.. I hope your foot heals soon. It's a good excuse to sit and
read, but I know it's a pain (no pun) when you want to get up and get
things done.

love, Valerie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] zoombinis as algebra
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ta muchly. I m sitting at the computer cos my knee hurts too much to do more than hobble so no housework for the day :-) One child is busy slaughtering
messages.messageBody:
On 13 Sep 02, at 11:38, SandraDodd@... wrote:

> http://www.terc.edu/handson/s96/zoom.html
>
> There, and illustrations too!
>
> I had thought I could get through the e-mail but my foot is hurting
> too much and so I have to go back to the couch with 300 unread
> messages. So it goes!
>
Ta muchly.

I'm sitting at the computer cos my knee hurts too much to do more
than hobble so no housework for the day :-)
One child is busy slaughtering samurai on the playstation while the
other two are playing Game of Life. I did amuse myself for a while
sitting watching and pretending the be the kid-pegs they've each
got in their cars. "are we there yet?" "How much further?" "he hit
me..."

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: zoombinis as algebra
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.terc.edu/handson/s96/zoom.html There, and illustrations too! I had thought I could get through the e-mail but my foot is hurting too much and so I
messages.messageBody:
http://www.terc.edu/handson/s96/zoom.html

There, and illustrations too!

I had thought I could get through the e-mail but my foot is hurting too much
and so I have to go back to the couch with 300 unread messages. So it goes!
